content:
Hello there We have read the message We try to help you

If you would like to run only a few filters, you can go to extra ) message filters ) select the filters you want to run and click on the button run now

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/organize-your-messages-using-filters

)As for turning off and on the adaptive filter if this is turned off and the option )reset training data then it is also turned off. This is quite an old way, try it.


Greetings firefox volunteer
creator: googlethunderbird
